name: fast tic-tac-toe
description:
hi .. hello! it is me again : a COMPLETE STRANGER!!!

anyways it is a simple game made in 3 days.. ( i am good at procrastinating)

alright lets talk about the reasons why should play the game:

-    1. the game is fast if you play fast! 

-    2. a fun local  multiplayer experience! (up to 2 players)

-    3. just why not?

future updates!  ( i will try atleast.. ):

-    1 .  Singleplayer ( a bot) update

-  2.   3 player mode update

-  3.  better graphics update 

- 4. SFX update !! (  w.i.p rn)

-  5.  android port of my game UPDATE!!!!!!!!!

ok now go and download it .And! you can even donate me money and get scammed!!
